rusty_key.name: Rusty Key
rusty_key.description: An old, rusty key with intricate engravings. It looks like it might open something important.
rusty_key.pickup_message: You picked up the rusty key. It feels surprisingly heavy in your hand.
rusty_key.use_message: You use the rusty key. It turns with a satisfying click!

ancient_tome.name: Ancient Tome
ancient_tome.description: A leather-bound book filled with mysterious symbols and arcane knowledge. Reading it makes you feel wiser.
ancient_tome.pickup_message: You carefully pick up the ancient tome. Knowledge flows through your fingers.
ancient_tome.use_message: You study the ancient tome and gain valuable knowledge!

glowing_crystal.name: Glowing Crystal
glowing_crystal.description: A beautiful crystal that pulses with inner light. It radiates warmth and seems to contain magical energy.
glowing_crystal.pickup_message: You carefully pick up the glowing crystal. It warms your hand with gentle energy.
glowing_crystal.use_message: You focus on the glowing crystal and feel your health restored!

torch.name: Torch
torch.description: A burning torch that provides light in dark places. The flame dances hypnotically.
torch.use_message: You hold the torch high, illuminating the area around you.

mysterious_scroll.name: Mysterious Scroll
mysterious_scroll.description: A rolled parchment with strange writing. The words seem to shimmer and change when you're not looking directly at them.
mysterious_scroll.pickup_message: You pick up the mysterious scroll. The parchment feels oddly warm.
mysterious_scroll.use_message: You unroll the scroll and read the mystical words aloud...
